name: Shrine of the Miko Dancer
description:
Help Reimu progress through various environments.
Enter the gap to go to the next level!
The gameplay is based on the theme "only once", actions can only be performed once before doing another one, for example right, left, right. But not right, right, left. 

Enjoy~ !

Keys:

  • WASD to fire in 4 directions
  • Arrow keys to move in 4 directions
  • R to reset
  • Space to start and use bombs

Credit:
 Graphic: Automn'
 Programming: JonathKane, Enalye
 Music: Drell
 Sound: Enalye
